title: Zion National Park: Current Fire Information
body: Current Fire Information       Wildland Fires There are currently no wildfires burning in Zion National Park  Prescribed Fires There are currently no prescribed fires in Zion National Park  Fire Restrictions There are currently no fire restrictions in Zion National Park National Fire Situation Report Fire Weather Fire News and Stories Fire Management Projects InciWeb - National Fire News Twitter - Zion Fire Management
